queryMap.query: SELECT /* rsm4031_s01 */ MEET_CD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RACE_DAY,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') RACE_DAY, RACE_YOIL, DECODE(RACE_YOIL,'MON','¿ù','TUE','È­','WED','¼ö','THU','¸ñ','FRI','±Ý','SAT','Åä','SUN','ÀÏ') AS RACE_YOIL_KOR, TMS||'È¸Â÷ '||DAY_ORD||'ÀÏÂ÷' AS RACE_DAY_INFO FROM VW_SDL_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD = ? AND RACE_DAY = ?

SELECT /* rsm4031_s02 */ MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå CASE WHEN BRNC_CD='00' THEN 'ÁöÁ¡°è' WHEN BRNC_CD='01' THEN 'º»Àå' WHEN BRNC_CD='600' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(º»Àå)' WHEN BRNC_CD='601' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(¼ö¿ø)' WHEN BRNC_CD='602' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(Áß¶û)' WHEN BRNC_CD='603' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(ÀÏ»ê)' WHEN BRNC_CD='604' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(µ¿´ë¹®)' WHEN BRNC_CD='605' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(ºÐ´ç)' WHEN BRNC_CD='606' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(Àå¾È)' WHEN BRNC_CD='607' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(»êº»)' WHEN BRNC_CD='608' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(ºÎÃµ)' WHEN BRNC_CD='609' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(°ü¾Ç)' WHEN BRNC_CD='610' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(¼ººÏ)' WHEN BRNC_CD='611' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(¿µµîÆ÷)' WHEN BRNC_CD='612' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(´ëÀü)' WHEN BRNC_CD='613' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(ÀÎÃµ)' WHEN BRNC_CD='614' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(½ÃÈï)' WHEN BRNC_CD='615' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(°­³²)' WHEN BRNC_CD='616' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(Ãµ¾È)' WHEN BRNC_CD='617' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(¿ÃÆÅ)' WHEN BRNC_CD='618' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(ÀÇÁ¤ºÎ)' WHEN BRNC_CD='698' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(¹Ì»ç¸®)' WHEN BRNC_CD='699' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(±¤¸í)' ELSE CD_NM END AS CD_NM, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÀÌ¸§ POOL_001*100 AS POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â POOL_002*100 AS POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â POOL_004*100 AS POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â POOL_005*100 AS POOL_005, -- º¹½Â POOL_006*100 AS POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â POOL_007*100 AS POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --POOL_008*100 AS POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â POOL_0012*100 AS POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â POOL_00456*100 AS POOL_00456, -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --POOL_0078*100 AS POOL_0078, -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ BRNC_ORDER FROM ( SELECT DECODE(BRNC_CD,null,'1',LEV) AS LEV, MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå DECODE(BRNC_CD,null,'00',BRNC_CD) AS BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_001),SUM(POOL_001)) AS POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_002),SUM(POOL_002)) AS POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_004),SUM(POOL_004)) AS POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_005),SUM(POOL_005)) AS POOL_005, -- º¹½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_006),SUM(POOL_006)) AS POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_007),SUM(POOL_007)) AS POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_008),SUM(POOL_008)) AS POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_0012),SUM(POOL_0012)) AS POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_00456),SUM(POOL_00456)) AS POOL_00456, -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_0078),SUM(POOL_0078)) AS POOL_0078, -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ DECODE(BRNC_CD,'14','15','15','14',BRNC_CD) AS BRNC_ORDER FROM ( SELECT LEV, MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå CASE WHEN LEV='2' AND (BRNC_CD > '01' AND BRNC_CD < '600') THEN '' ELSE BRNC_CD END AS BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â POOL_005, -- º¹½Â POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â POOL_00456 -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --POOL_0078 -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ FROM ( SELECT MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå SUM(POOL_001) AS POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â SUM(POOL_002) AS POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â SUM(POOL_004) AS POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â SUM(POOL_005) AS POOL_005, -- º¹½Â SUM(POOL_006) AS POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â SUM(POOL_007) AS POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --SUM(POOL_008) AS POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â SUM(POOL_0012) AS POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â SUM(POOL_00456) AS POOL_00456 -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --SUM(POOL_0078) AS POOL_0078 -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ FROM ( SELECT B.MEET_CD, A.SELL_CD, A.COMM_NO, A.DIV_NO, CASE WHEN A.SELL_CD = DECODE(?,'003','03','01') AND A.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN '01' -- 0:MEET_CD °æ·û ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '11' THEN '11' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '12' THEN '12' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '13' THEN '13' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '14' THEN '14' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '15' THEN '15' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '16' THEN '16' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '17' THEN '17' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '18' THEN '18' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '19' THEN '19' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '20' THEN '20' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '21' THEN '21' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '22' THEN '22' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '23' THEN '23' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '24' THEN '24' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '25' THEN '25' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '26' THEN '26' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '27' THEN '27' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '28' THEN '28' WHEN B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD IN ('00103','00203','00403') AND A.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN '98' WHEN B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD IN ('00301') AND A.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN '99' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '00' AND SUBSTR(B.MEET_CD,2,2) = A.SELL_CD THEN '600' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '00' AND B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD IN ('00103','00203','00403') THEN '698' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '00' AND B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD IN ('00301') THEN '699' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '01' THEN '601' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '02' THEN '602' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '03' THEN '603' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '04' THEN '604' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '05' THEN '605' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '06' THEN '606' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '07' THEN '607' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '08' THEN '608' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '09' THEN '609' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '10' THEN '610' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '11' THEN '611' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '12' THEN '612' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '13' THEN '613' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '14' THEN '614' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '15' THEN '615' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '16' THEN '616' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '17' THEN '617' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '18' THEN '618' ELSE '600' END AS BRNC_CD, SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='001' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='002' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='004' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='005' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_005, -- º¹½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='008' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='001' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END)+SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='002' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â¿¬½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='004' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END)+SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='005' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END)+SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_00456 -- ´Ü½Â¿¬½Â --SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END)+SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='008' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_0078 -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ FROM VW_SDL_INFO B, -- °æÁÖÀÏ VW_PC_SATLIT A -- ÃÑ¸ÅÃâ¾× WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.MEET_CD = ? -- 1:MEET_CD -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå AND B.RACE_DAY = ? -- 2:RACE_DAY -- °æÁÖÀÏ AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MEET_CD = B.MEET_CD AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD GROUP BY B.MEET_CD,A.SELL_CD,A.COMM_NO,A.DIV_NO,B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD )AA WHERE 1=1 AND BRNC_CD <> 'X' GROUP BY AA.MEET_CD, AA.BRNC_CD )AAA,(SELECT LEVEL AS LEV FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <=2) DU --S UNION ALL SELECT 1 LEV, ? MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå CD BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå 0 POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â 0 POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â 0 POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â 0 POOL_005, -- º¹½Â 0 POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â 0 POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --0 POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â 0 POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â 0 POOL_00456 -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --0 POOL_0078 -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.GRP_CD = '018' --±×·ìÄÚµå AND A.CD NOT IN('00','01','02','03','04','05','06','08','98') --E
)AAAA GROUP BY LEV, MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå BRNC_CD -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå )BB,(SELECT A.CD --»ó¼¼ÄÚµå , A.CD_NM --»ó¼¼ÄÚµå¸í FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.GRP_CD = '060' --±×·ìÄÚµå AND A.CD NOT IN('00','01','02','03','04','05','06','08','98') ) CC -- ÁöÁ¡ ÀÌ¸§ WHERE 1=1 AND LEV <> '2' AND BB.BRNC_CD=CC.CD(+) ORDER BY BRNC_ORDER

SELECT /* rsm4031_s03 */ MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå CASE WHEN BRNC_CD='00' THEN 'ÁöÁ¡°è' WHEN BRNC_CD='01' THEN 'º»Àå' WHEN BRNC_CD='698' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(¹Ì»ç¸®)' WHEN BRNC_CD='699' THEN '±×¸°Ä«µå(±¤¸í)' ELSE CD_NM END AS CD_NM, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÀÌ¸§ POOL_001*100 AS POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â POOL_002*100 AS POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â POOL_004*100 AS POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â POOL_005*100 AS POOL_005, -- º¹½Â POOL_006*100 AS POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â POOL_007*100 AS POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --POOL_008*100 AS POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â POOL_0012*100 AS POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â POOL_00456*100 AS POOL_00456, -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --POOL_0078*100 AS POOL_0078, -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ BRNC_ORDER FROM ( SELECT DECODE(BRNC_CD,null,'1',LEV) AS LEV, MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå DECODE(BRNC_CD,null,'00',BRNC_CD) AS BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_001),SUM(POOL_001)) AS POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_002),SUM(POOL_002)) AS POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_004),SUM(POOL_004)) AS POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_005),SUM(POOL_005)) AS POOL_005, -- º¹½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_006),SUM(POOL_006)) AS POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_007),SUM(POOL_007)) AS POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_008),SUM(POOL_008)) AS POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_0012),SUM(POOL_0012)) AS POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_00456),SUM(POOL_00456)) AS POOL_00456, -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --DECODE(LEV,1,SUM(POOL_0078),SUM(POOL_0078)) AS POOL_0078, -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ DECODE(BRNC_CD,'14','15','15','14',BRNC_CD) AS BRNC_ORDER FROM ( SELECT LEV, MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå CASE WHEN LEV='2' AND (BRNC_CD > '01' AND BRNC_CD < '600') THEN '' ELSE BRNC_CD END AS BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â POOL_005, -- º¹½Â POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â POOL_00456 -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --POOL_0078 -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ FROM ( SELECT MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå SUM(POOL_001) AS POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â SUM(POOL_002) AS POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â SUM(POOL_004) AS POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â SUM(POOL_005) AS POOL_005, -- º¹½Â SUM(POOL_006) AS POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â SUM(POOL_007) AS POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --SUM(POOL_008) AS POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â SUM(POOL_0012) AS POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â SUM(POOL_00456) AS POOL_00456 -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --SUM(POOL_0078) AS POOL_0078 -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ FROM ( SELECT B.MEET_CD, A.SELL_CD, A.COMM_NO, A.DIV_NO, CASE WHEN A.SELL_CD = DECODE(?,'003','03','01') AND A.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN '01' -- 0:MEET_CD °æ·û ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '11' THEN '11' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '12' THEN '12' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '13' THEN '13' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '14' THEN '14' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '15' THEN '15' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '16' THEN '16' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '17' THEN '17' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '18' THEN '18' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '19' THEN '19' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '20' THEN '20' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '21' THEN '21' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '22' THEN '22' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '23' THEN '23' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '24' THEN '24' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '25' THEN '25' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '26' THEN '26' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '27' THEN '27' WHEN A.SELL_CD = '01' AND A.COMM_NO = '28' THEN '28' WHEN B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD IN ('00103','00203','00403') AND A.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN '98' WHEN B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD IN ('00301') AND A.COMM_NO IN ('01','02','03','04','08') THEN '99' --±×¸°Ä«µå ºÎºÐ ÀÏ¹ÝÀÌ¶û ÅëÇÕ WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '00' AND SUBSTR(B.MEET_CD,2,2) = A.SELL_CD THEN '01' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '00' AND B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD IN ('00103','00203','00403') THEN '698' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '00' AND B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD IN ('00301') THEN '699' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '01' THEN '11' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '02' THEN '12' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '03' THEN '13' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '04' THEN '15' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '05' THEN '14' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '06' THEN '16' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '07' THEN '17' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '08' THEN '18' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '09' THEN '19' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '10' THEN '20' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '11' THEN '21' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '12' THEN '22' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '13' THEN '23' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '14' THEN '24' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '15' THEN '25' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '16' THEN '26' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '17' THEN '27' WHEN A.SELL_CD IN('01') AND A.COMM_NO = '06' AND A.DIV_NO = '18' THEN '28' ELSE '01' END AS BRNC_CD, SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='001' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='002' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='004' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='005' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_005, -- º¹½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='008' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='001' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END)+SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='002' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â¿¬½Â SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='004' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END)+SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='005' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END)+SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_00456 -- ´Ü½Â¿¬½Â --SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END)+SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='008' THEN A.NET_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS POOL_0078 -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ FROM VW_SDL_INFO B, -- °æÁÖÀÏ VW_PC_SATLIT A -- ÃÑ¸ÅÃâ¾× WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.MEET_CD = ? -- 1:MEET_CD -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå AND B.RACE_DAY = ? -- 2:RACE_DAY -- °æÁÖÀÏ AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MEET_CD = B.MEET_CD AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD GROUP BY B.MEET_CD,A.SELL_CD,A.COMM_NO,A.DIV_NO,B.MEET_CD||A.SELL_CD )AA WHERE 1=1 AND BRNC_CD <> 'X' GROUP BY AA.MEET_CD, AA.BRNC_CD )AAA,(SELECT LEVEL AS LEV FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <=2) DU --S UNION ALL SELECT 1 LEV, ? MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå CD BRNC_CD, -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå 0 POOL_001, -- ´Ü½Â 0 POOL_002, -- ¿¬½Â 0 POOL_004, -- ½Ö½Â 0 POOL_005, -- º¹½Â 0 POOL_006, -- »ïº¹½Â 0 POOL_007, -- »ï½Ö½Â --0 POOL_008, -- ½Öº¹½Â 0 POOL_0012, -- ´Ü½Â/¿¬½Â 0 POOL_00456 -- ½Ö,º¹,»ïº¹ --0 POOL_0078 -- »ï½Ö,½Öº¹ FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.GRP_CD = '018' --±×·ìÄÚµå AND A.CD NOT IN('00','01','02','03','04','05','06','08','98') --E
)AAAA GROUP BY LEV, MEET_CD, -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐÄÚµå BRNC_CD -- ÁöÁ¡ ÄÚµå )BB,(SELECT A.CD --»ó¼¼ÄÚµå , A.CD_NM --»ó¼¼ÄÚµå¸í FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.GRP_CD = '060' --±×·ìÄÚµå AND A.CD NOT IN('00','01','02','03','04','05','06','08','98') ) CC -- ÁöÁ¡ ÀÌ¸§ WHERE 1=1 AND LEV <> '2' AND BB.BRNC_CD=CC.CD(+) ORDER BY BRNC_ORDER

SELECT /* rsm4031_s02 */ B.MEET_CD, SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='001' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS B1, SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='002' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS B2, SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='004' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS B4, SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='005' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS B5, SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS B6, SUM(CASE WHEN POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS B7, END)*100 AS C2, SUM(CASE WHEN COMM_NO = '07' AND POOL_CD='004' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS C4, SUM(CASE WHEN COMM_NO = '07' AND POOL_CD='005' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS C5, SUM(CASE WHEN COMM_NO = '07' AND POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS C6, SUM(CASE WHEN COMM_NO = '07' AND POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS C7, --SUM(CASE WHEN COMM_NO = '07' AND POOL_CD='008' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS C8, SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO NOT IN('06','07') AND POOL_CD='001' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS D1, SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO NOT IN('06','07') AND POOL_CD='002' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS D2, SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO NOT IN('06','07') AND POOL_CD='004' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS D4, SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO NOT IN('06','07') AND POOL_CD='005' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS D5, SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO NOT IN('06','07') AND POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS D6, SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO NOT IN('06','07') AND POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS D7, --SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO NOT IN('06','07') AND POOL_CD='008' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS D8, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '07' AND DIV_NO = '01' AND POOL_CD='001' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS E1, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '07' AND SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '00' AND POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS W6, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '00' AND POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS W7, --SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '00' AND POOL_CD='008' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS W8, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '15' AND POOL_CD='001' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS X1, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '15' AND POOL_CD='002' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS X2, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '15' AND POOL_CD='004' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS X4, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '15' AND POOL_CD='005' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS X5, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '15' AND POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS X6, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '15' AND POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS X7, --SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '15' AND POOL_CD='008' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS X8, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '17' AND POOL_CD='001' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS Y1, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '17' AND POOL_CD='002' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS Y2, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '17' AND POOL_CD='004' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS Y4, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '17' AND POOL_CD='005' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS Y5, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '17' AND POOL_CD='006' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS Y6, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '17' AND POOL_CD='007' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS Y7 --SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD = '01' AND COMM_NO = '06' AND DIV_NO = '17' AND POOL_CD='008' THEN A.NET_AMT END)*100 AS Y8 FROM VW_SDL_INFO B, -- °æÁÖÀÏ VW_PC_SATLIT A -- ÃÑ¸ÅÃâ¾× WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD -- °æ·û, °æÁ¤ ±¸ºÐ ÄÚµå AND B.RACE_DAY = ? -- 1:RACE_DAY -- °æÁÖÀÏ AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MEET_CD = B.MEET_CD AND A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.TMS = B.TMS AND A.DAY_ORD = B.DAY_ORD GROUP BY B.MEET_CD, B.STND_YEAR
